title: I Am Reformed.
body:
2 Months ago i was suspended because i intentionally fed in a normal game. I have not Intentionally fed or afk'd in a league of legends games for the month and half i had my account back, I was hoping to earn loot again TY

Username - MrSexyGamer

replies.body:
No Kayle for you sucker

:P Ha ha I got it you didn't lululullululululululu

Hey summoner,

Good to see you're making progress towards reform :D

Something to remember is that being "reformed" doesn't just mean that you don't intentionally AFK or feed. It also means that your behaviour in chat is friendly and constructive.

But if you're 100% sure that your behaviour has been really positive, **in-game and in chat for at least a month**, then it might be a good idea to send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asking what you're still doing wrong.

I hope that helps.
You don't really deserve rewards, you intentionally fed. {{summoner:11}}
